channel.title: BlitzzScape V1 (still in beta)
channel.description:
[size=12pt]Server Forums [color=orange]pm me for link[/color] To see some things about server, 30+ members registered.[/size]
Real quick, some info about myself... Im 15, but dont worry im not one of thoes immature anoying kids and also my voice isnt all high pitched so thats a + My names tanner...odvisully..i want to work on computers for a living, i have skype/T.V/and i will get any other program...so yeah thats about it thanks and i hope somone wants to do this with me!
I allready have a good sorce with some things added its a 317 PI. thanks
(ps sorry for spelling errors)
Must Live in the US!!!
1 thing we added, Fully working dicing with emote! [IMG]http://i1219.photobucket.com/albums/dd434/tannerguy/Dicing1.png[/img]
Goals:
Fix Torva Halth
Get more players
Develop Auto Donation + Vote System
Redo slayer
Redo fishing
Redo firemaking
Castle wars
Custom Mini games
Perfect economy
----_Simply fill this out for what you want to be_----
Application forums below!
Coder/Programmer Applying for?(Main Coder, side coder): Age: Years with Java: Why should we choose you?: Skype: Java knowledge?(1/10): Proof of any work?
Video Maker: Applying for(Recorder/Editor/Bolth): Skype: Age: Experience in this/proof/: Extra:

item.title: BlitzzScape V1 (still in beta)
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Coder/Programmer
Applying for?(Main Coder, side coder): Server-Side
Age: 16
Years with Java: 2.5-3
Why should we choose you?: I know what this entails, and I always try to maintain a professional environment towards my fellow players and co-workers.
Skype: nolan-peterson
Java knowledge?(1/10): 7
Proof of any work?: I have never released any of my servers, although I helped loveandpower with Final Judgement to a small extent before release.

item.title: BlitzzScape V1 (still in beta)
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Mr Rushed, post:6, topic:421477”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=524141.msg3814767#msg3814767 date=1321223465]
Finally somebody mature.

Coder/Programmer
Applying for?(Main Coder, side coder): Server-Sided.
Age: 17
Years with Java: Soon to be a full year.
Why should we choose you?: I know how to program/write multiple things, and am willing to learn more if the task you ask of me is something out of my knowledge.
MSN: lazerbike@hotmail.com
Java knowledge?(1/10): 1(considering RSPS coding is barely basic Java)
Proof of any work? I’m in some dev teams. Rune-Sanctum, ResistancePk, and Fantasy World. I’ve worked with other sources other than PI(Fantasy World is Delta-based).
[/quote]

Lol are you being serious or joking around…[/quote]
da fuck. what part you talking about.
